title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.4 - Reporting of injury or illness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.4 - Reporting of injury or illness

State Regulations

Any injury or illness to a professional boxing or
professional mixed martial arts participant before a contest or exhibition
scheduled to be held in the State of New York, or while in training for any
such contest or exhibition, shall be fully reported in writing to the

Commission within 24 hours of its onset by the participant or the participant's
manager. Notes

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
